languages.text: "Утверждение ложно. Твои регалии отозваны, ты признан дефективным и будешь устранен". {n}Обернувшись к вам, Паскаль сухо произносит:{/n} "Инициирую поиск {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}херетека{/g}, определенного как "Деменц Ханейманн". Я желаю совершить процедуру воздаяния".

"This statement is false. Your regalia have been revoked, you have been deemed defective and will be eliminated." {n}Pasqal turns to you and says dryly,{/n} "Initiating {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} search, designation: Dementz Haneumann. I wish to execute the retribution procedure."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение ложно. Твои регалии отозваны, ты признан дефективным и будешь устранен". {n}Обернувшись к вам, Паскаль сухо произносит:{/n} "Инициирую поиск {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}херетека{/g}, определенного как "Деменц Ханейманн". Я желаю совершить процедуру воздаяния".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false. Your regalia have been revoked, you have been deemed defective and will be eliminated." {n}Pasqal turns to you and says dryly,{/n} "Initiating the search of a heretek, designation: Dementz Haneumann. I wish to execute the retribution procedure."

"This statement is false. Your regalia have been revoked, you have been deemed defective and will be eliminated." {n}Pasqal turns to you and says dryly,{/n} "Initiating the search of a heretek, designation: Dementz Haneumann. I wish to execute the retribution procedure."

"This statement is false. Your regalia have been revoked, you have been deemed defective and will be eliminated." {n}Pasqal turns to you and says dryly,{/n} "Initiating the search of heretek, designation: Dementz Haneumann. I wish to execute the retribution procedure."

"This statement is false. Your regalia have been revoked, you have been deemed defective and will be eliminated." {n}Pasqal turns to you and says dryly,{/n} "Initiating the search of heretek, designation: Dementz Haneumann. I wish to execute the retribution procedure."

"This statement is false. Your regalia have been revoked, you have been deemed defective and will be eliminated." {n}Pasqal turns to you and says dryly,{/n} "Initiating {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} search, designation: Dementz Haneumann. I wish to execute the retribution procedure."

"This statement is false. Your regalia have been revoked, you have been deemed defective and will be eliminated." {n}Pasqal turns to you and says dryly,{/n} "Initiating {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} search, designation: Dementz Haneumann. I wish to execute the retribution procedure."

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的。你的权力已经被撤销了，你被认为是有缺陷的成员，即将被处理掉。”{n}帕斯卡转向了你，以干巴巴的声音开了口。{/n}“正在启动{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}异教{/g}搜索，指定目标：德曼兹·哈努曼。我希望执行复仇程序。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Your regalia have been revoked, you have been deemed defective and will be eliminated." {n}Pasqal turns to you and says dryly,{/n} "Initiating {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} search, designation: Dementz Haneumann. I wish to execute the retribution procedure."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的。你的权力已经被撤销了，你被认为是有缺陷的成员，即将被处理掉。”{n}帕斯卡转向了你，以干巴巴的声音开了口。{/n}“正在启动{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}异教{/g}搜索，指定目标：德曼兹·哈努曼。我希望执行复仇程序。”

languages.text: «Esa declaración es falsa. Sus privilegios han sido revocados, se le ha declarado defectuoso y será eliminado». {n}Pasqal se gira hacia ti y, con voz seca, declara:{/n} «Iniciando búsqueda {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g}, designación: Dementz Haneumann. Quiero ejecutar el procedimiento de retribución».
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Your regalia have been revoked, you have been deemed defective and will be eliminated." {n}Pasqal turns to you and says dryly,{/n} "Initiating {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} search, designation: Dementz Haneumann. I wish to execute the retribution procedure."

traits.locale_text: «Esa declaración es falsa. Sus privilegios han sido revocados, se le ha declarado defectuoso y será eliminado». {n}Pasqal se gira hacia ti y, con voz seca, declara:{/n} «Iniciando búsqueda {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g}, designación: Dementz Haneumann. Quiero ejecutar el procedimiento de retribución».

languages.text: 「その発言は誤りだ。貴様のレガリアは剥奪されて、欠陥品とみなされ、排除される」{n}パスカルはこちらに向き直って、乾いた口調で言った。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}異端技術{/g}の捜索を開始します。指定：デメンツ・へニュマン。報復手続きを実行したい」
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Your regalia have been revoked, you have been deemed defective and will be eliminated." {n}Pasqal turns to you and says dryly,{/n} "Initiating {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} search, designation: Dementz Haneumann. I wish to execute the retribution procedure."

traits.locale_text: 「その発言は誤りだ。貴様のレガリアは剥奪されて、欠陥品とみなされ、排除される」{n}パスカルはこちらに向き直って、乾いた口調で言った。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}異端技術{/g}の捜索を開始します。指定：デメンツ・へニュマン。報復手続きを実行したい」

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist falsch. Eure Insignien wurden Euch abgesprochen, Ihr wurdet als defekt erachtet und werdet eliminiert." {n}Pasqal wendet sich dir zu und meint trocken:{/n} "Leite {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}Häretekt{/g}-Suche ein, Bezeichnung: Dementz Haneumann. Ich möchte die Vergeltungsprozedur durchführen."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Your regalia have been revoked, you have been deemed defective and will be eliminated." {n}Pasqal turns to you and says dryly,{/n} "Initiating {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} search, designation: Dementz Haneumann. I wish to execute the retribution procedure."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist falsch. Eure Insignien wurden Euch abgesprochen, Ihr wurdet als defekt erachtet und werdet eliminiert." {n}Pasqal wendet sich dir zu und meint trocken:{/n} "Leite {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}Häretekt{/g}-Suche ein, Bezeichnung: Dementz Haneumann. Ich möchte die Vergeltungsprozedur durchführen."

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. Vos prérogatives ont été révoquées, vous avez été jugé défectueux et vous allez être éliminé. » {n}Pasqal se tourne vers vous et ajoute d'un ton sec,{/n} « Lancement de la recherche d'{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}hérétek{/g}, désignation : Dementz Haneumann. Je souhaite exécuter la procédure de châtiment. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Your regalia have been revoked, you have been deemed defective and will be eliminated." {n}Pasqal turns to you and says dryly,{/n} "Initiating {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} search, designation: Dementz Haneumann. I wish to execute the retribution procedure."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. Vos prérogatives ont été révoquées, vous avez été jugé défectueux et vous allez être éliminé. » {n}Pasqal se tourne vers vous et ajoute d'un ton sec,{/n} « Lancement de la recherche d'{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}hérétek{/g}, désignation : Dementz Haneumann. Je souhaite exécuter la procédure de châtiment. »

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Rütbelerin alındı, kusurlu addedildin ve imha edileceksin." {n}Pasqal sana dönüp kuru bir şekilde ekliyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}Tekâfir{/g} taraması başlatılıyor. Sıfat: Dementz Haneumann. İntikam prosedürünü uygulamak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Your regalia have been revoked, you have been deemed defective and will be eliminated." {n}Pasqal turns to you and says dryly,{/n} "Initiating {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} search, designation: Dementz Haneumann. I wish to execute the retribution procedure."

traits.locale_text: "Bu ifade yanlış. Rütbelerin alındı, kusurlu addedildin ve imha edileceksin." {n}Pasqal sana dönüp kuru bir şekilde ekliyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}Tekâfir{/g} taraması başlatılıyor, sıfat: Dementz Haneumann. İntikam prosedürünü uygulamak istiyorum."
